      • setTextRepeat

        public void setTextRepeat(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> updater,
                          int interval)
        Enable an updater for the textual content of the message on a fixed timer. It is recommended to keep the interval at least 5 seconds due to Discord rate limiting.
        Parameters:
        updater - a supplier of the new content
        interval - the interval of the update, in seconds

      • setEmbedRepeat

        public void setEmbedRepeat(java.util.function.Supplier<net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.MessageEmbed> updater,
                           int interval)
        Enable an updater for the embed content of the message on a fixed timer. It is recommended to keep the interval at least 5 seconds due to Discord rate limiting.
        Parameters:
        updater - a supplier of the new content
        interval - the interval of the update, in seconds

      • refreshMessage

        public void refreshMessage(net.dv8tion.jda.core.JDA jda)
        Refresh the delegate instance. This is typically useful for updating which reactions have been applied to the message.
        Parameters:
        jda - the JDA instance
